attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislate that all UK dog owners register their dogs on a dog DNA data base.

All dog excretement left in public places can be traced and offending dog owners to be charged a dog fouling tax.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
